amendment.description: Amendment provides that any limitation on funding for the Environmental Protection Agency or the Council on Environmental Quality shall not apply to conducting educational outreach or informational seminars.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to specify that any limitation on funding to EPA or the Council on Environmental Quality shall not apply to conducting educational outreach or informational seminars.

action.text: On agreeing to the Obey amendment (A006) Agreed to by recorded vote: 226 - 198 (Roll No. 332).
